name: Double, double, scrollbar buttons
description:
WILL NOT WORK WITH NON-WEBKIT BROWSERS
Double scrollbar buttons. Slightly smaller scrollbar. Green scrollbar.
I don't own any of it, I only compiled it into a single file.
css:
/* Modified from the CSS on the webpage: https://trac.webkit.org/export/41842/trunk/LayoutTests/scrollbars/overflow-scrollbar-combinations.html found at: https://www.webkit.org/blog/363/styling-scrollbars/ Minified by http://cssminifier.com/ */
